Title: Relates to human trafficking awareness and training for public transportation employees
Summary: Relates to human trafficking awareness and training for public transit employees; mandates displaying human trafficking resource materials created by the state public transportation safety board and the department of transportation in all public transit modes of transportation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the transportation law, in relation to human trafficking awareness and training for public transit employees and mandated displayed materials created by the state public transportation safety board and the department of transportation
